imt: {} I.\textsc{nom} be-\textsc{inf} you.\textsc{ins.sg} go-\textsc{lpt.sg.m} \textsc{cond-1sg} to doctor-\textsc{dat.sg}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} Já bý-t tebou], še-l by-ch k lékař-i.
trs: If I were you, I would go to the doctor.' \hfill (\ili{Czech}; \citealt[683]{Travnicek1951})

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Prše-t], zůsta-l-i bych-om doma.
trs: If it rained, we would stay at home.' \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][167]{Svoboda1959}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Ne-mí-t sv-ou hudb-u], tak se tu z-blázní-m!
trs: If I had not my music, I would become insane here.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][4]{Milotova2012}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Dozvědě-t se to Němc-i], tak nás {[\ldots]}\hspace{-2pt} po-stříle-l-i.
trs: If the Germans had learnt that, they would have shot us.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][371]{Meyer2010}

imt: {} I.\textsc{nom} have-\textsc{inf} money-\textsc{acc.pl} buy;\textsc{pf}-\textsc{1sg} this.\textsc{acc.sg} {} buy;\textsc{pf}-\textsc{lpt.sg.m} be.\textsc{1sg} this.\textsc{acc.sg}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} Já mí-t peníz-e], koupí-m to / koupi-l jsem to.
trs: If I had money, I would buy this.'/`If I had had money, I would have bought this.' \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][683]{Travnicek1951}

imt: {} if \textsc{refl} look.at-\textsc{inf} closer then visible at bottom little-\textsc{acc.pl} letter-\textsc{acc.pl}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} Jeśli się przyjrze-ć bliżej], to widać na dole mał-e literk-i.
trs: If one takes a closer look, one can see little letters at the bottom.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Polish};][455]{EngelKuc1999}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Bý-t otec doma], by-l-o by se to ne-sta-l-o.
trs: If father had been at home, this would not have happened.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][65]{Svoboda1960a}

imt: {} \textsc{pf}-make-\textsc{inf} this.\textsc{acc} somebody.\textsc{nom} today \textsc{neg}-be-\textsc{lpt-sg.n} \textsc{cond.3sg} on this.\textsc{loc} nothing extraordinary-\textsc{gen.sg.n}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} U-děla-t to někdo dnes], ne-by-l-o by na tom nic výjimečn-ého.
trs: If somebody did this today, there would not be anything extraordinary about it.' \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][1]{Milotova2012}

src: Ži-l-a by-s úplně jinak, [\hspace{-2pt} ne-bý-t válk-y]?
trs: Would you have led a completely different life, if there had not been the war?' \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][7]{Milotova2012}

imt: {} {burn.down};\textsc{pf}.\textsc{3sg}$=$if 1 kg.\textsc{nom} coal-\textsc{gen.sg} on grate-\textsc{loc.sg} boiler-\textsc{gen.sg} steam-\textsc{gen.sg} engine-\textsc{gen.sg} emit;\textsc{pf}.\textsc{3sg} 7000 big-\textsc{gen.pl} calory-\textsc{gen.pl}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} Shoří-li 1 kg uhl-í na ohništ-i kotl-e parn-ího stroj-e], vydá 7000 velk-ých kalori-í.
trs: If 1 kg of coal burns down on the grate of a boiler of a steam engine, it emits 7000 kilocalories.

imt: {} {burn.down};\textsc{pf}-\textsc{inf} 1 kg.\textsc{nom} coal-\textsc{gen.sg} on grate-\textsc{loc.sg} boiler-\textsc{gen.sg} steam-\textsc{gen.sg} engine-\textsc{gen.sg} emit;\textsc{pf}.\textsc{3sg} 7000 big-\textsc{gen.pl} calory-\textsc{gen.pl}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} Shoře-t 1 kg uhl-í na ohništ-i kotl-e parn-ího stroj-e], vydá 7000 velk-ých kalori-í.
trs: If 1 kg of coal was burning down on the grate of a boiler of a steam engine, it would emit 7000 kilocalories.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][77]{Svoboda1960a}

src: Ži-l-a by-s úplně jinak, [\hspace{-2pt} ne-bý-t válk-y]?
trs: Would you have led a completely different life, if there had not been the war?

src: Ži-l-a by-s úplně jinak, [\hspace{-2pt} kdy-by ne-by-l-a válk-a]?
trs: Would you have led a completely different life, if there had not been the war?

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Ne-mí-t sv-ou hudb-u], tak se tu z-blázní-m!
trs: If I had not my music, I would become insane here.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][4]{Milotova2012}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Že nikdo ne-protestova-l], \textit{ho} ne-překvapi-l-o.
trs: The fact that nobody spoke up against it did not surprise him.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][168]{Fried1994}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Když domluvi-l], odmlče-l \textit{se}.
trs: When he had finished speaking, he fell silent.' \\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][130--131]{Junghanns2002}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Bý-t otec doma], by-l-o \textit{by} se to ne-sta-l-o.
trs: If father had been at home, this would not have happened.'\label{ex:father2-b}\\ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][65]{Svoboda1960a}

imt: when be.\textsc{1pl} \textsc{refl} here be-\textsc{lpt-pl} {in-spring} walk-\textsc{inf} with Pauline remark-\textsc{lpt-sg.f} {} that {} \textsc{neg}-be-\textsc{inf} me.\textsc{gen} {at-all} \textsc{cond.3sg} here on these.\textsc{acc.pl} gloomy-\textsc{acc.pl} rock-\textsc{acc.pl} \textsc{neg}-go-\textsc{lpt-sg.f} because \textsc{neg}.be.\textsc{3sg} romantic.\textsc{nom.sg.m} like I.\textsc{nom}
src: Když jsme se tu by-l-i zjara projí-t s Pauline, prohodi-l-a, [\hspace{-2pt} že [\hspace{-2pt} ne-bý-t mě], vůbec by sem na ty smutn-é skál-y ne-doš-l-a], protože není romantik jako já.
trs: When we went for a walk here in spring with Pauline, she remarked that, if it had not been for me, she would not at all have climbed these gloomy rocks, since she is not a romantic like me.' \\ \hfill (\ili{Czech}; Miloš Urban: \textit{Přišla z moře.} Praha: Argo 2014, 178--179.)

src: Ne-vědě-l, že \minsp{[} ne-bý-t mě], vůbec by tu ne-by-l.
trs: He didn't know that, if it was not for me, he would not be here at all.

src: Part-a by se rozpad-l-a, [\hspace{-2pt} ne-bý-t televiz-e].
trs: The group would (have) fall(en) apart, if there would not (have) be(en) television.' \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][4]{Milotova2012}

src: {[\textsc{pro}$_i$} Ne-mí-t sv-ou hudb-u], tak se tu {\textit{pro}$_i$} z-blázní-m!
trs: If I had not my music, I would become insane here.

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Bý-t otec$_j$ doma], by-l-o by se to$_i$ ne-sta-l-o.
trs: If father had been at home, this would not have happened.

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Otec$_j$ bý-t doma], by-l-o by se to$_i$ ne-sta-l-o.
trs: If F/ATHER had been at home, this would not have happened.

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Já$_i$ bý-t váš syn], tak se \textit{pro}$_i$ ne-žení-m.
trs: If /I were your son, I would not marry.'\\\xspace\hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][12]{Milotova2012}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Já$_j$ bý-t doma], by-l-o by se to$_i$ ne-sta-l-o.
trs: If /I had been at home, this would not have happened.

src: Pod jak-ou podmínk-ou by se to by-l-o ne-sta-l-o?
trs: Under what condition would this not have happened?'\label{ex:frage-a}

src: Otec bý-t doma.
trs: \textit{intended:} `If father had been at home.'\label{ex:frage-b}

imt: {} \textsc{neg}-be-\textsc{inf} thing-\textsc{gen.pl} with which.\textsc{ins.pl}-\textsc{rel} be.\textsc{1sg} pointlessly \textsc{pf}-lose-\textsc{lpt-sg.m} time.\textsc{acc.sg} stand-\textsc{lpt-sg.m} be.\textsc{1sg} now {in.front.of} ruler-\textsc{ins.sg}
src: [\hspace{-2pt} Ne-bý-t	věc-í, s nimi-ž jsem zbytečně z-tráce-l čas], stá-l jsem ted' před vládc-em.
trs: If there had not been things with which I pointlessly spent my time, I would now be standing in front of the ruler.’ \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][5]{Milotova2012}

src: [\hspace{-2pt} Ne-bý-t Clintonov-y administrativ-y], ne-jsme v NATO.
trs: If it had not been for the Clinton administration, we would not be in the NATO.' \hfill \citep[\ili{Czech};][5]{Milotova2012}
